mapper.insert: INSERT INTO covid(seq, stateDt, stateTime, decideCnt, deathCnt, createDt, updateDt) VALUES (#{seq},#{stateDt},#{stateTime},#{decideCnt},#{deathCnt},#{createDt},#{updateDt})
mapper.select: SELECT covid.*, LAG(decideCnt)OVER(ORDER BY stateDt DESC)-decideCnt daily_decideCnt FROM covid WHERE stateDt BETWEEN #{startDt} and #{endDt}
mapper.update: UPDATE covid SET stateDt=#{stateDt}, stateTime=#{stateTime}, decideCnt=#{decideCnt}, deathCnt=#{deathCnt}, createDt=#{createDt}, updateDt=#{updateDt} WHERE seq=#{seq}
